response.overview: The Cost of Living follows three families in Flushing, Queens, as they struggle with rising economic hardship in their once-affordable neighborhood.  Historically, NYC's outer boroughs have been havens for hardworking communities, but Flushing now faces a growing crisis. Luxury housing for the global elite is rapidly replacing affordable options, pushing the working class to the brink of financial instability.  This documentary highlights their resilience as they fight to afford rent and groceries while holding onto hope for a better future. The Cost of Living is a powerful reflection of survival amid soaring costs, aiming to inspire empathy and community.
response.title: The Cost of Living
